title: Tesla to recall more than 9,000 Model X SUVs, NHTSA says
description: Tesla is recalling 9,136 Model X SUVs because the roof trim might detach, posing a potential road hazard. This recall stands out as Tesla usually addresses issues through software updates. The company has pledged to reattach the trim at no cost to owners. Earlier this year, Tesla had recalled nearly 2.6 million vehicles for various safety concerns.
